luacache-desc: Adds global key-value caching via Scribunto (Lua) functions
right-luacachecanexpand: Modify LuaCache for the entire wiki through MediaWiki API
luacache-logpagetext: This is a log of all LuaCache writes that were executed by users through the MediaWiki API.
luacache-logentry-apiwrite: modified LuaCache through the API on $1
luacache-logentry-preview: modified LuaCache through an edit preview on $1
luacache-api-help-param-luacachewrite: If true and the user has sufficient rights, LuaCache write actions will take an effect on the entire wiki.
